title: These 1x1's Located In Great Neighborhood! Easy Commute!
posting_body: Here at the Marlow Apartments in Santa Rosa, you'll find our newly renovated apartments nestled in a garden style complex, and a welcoming place to call home.
We're conveniently located near the 101 freeway and Hwy 12....making for an easy commute in any direction.
We're only minutes to SSU, Empire College, SRJC, along with the new Sutter Hospital and Kaiser Permanente.
There are also two great shopping malls nearby, a performing arts center, many popular restaurants and award winning local wineries...all just waiting for you to enjoy.
* Beautiful wood-inspired laminate flooring, carpet in bedrooms
* Upgrades include all new appliances, cabinets, flooring, and more!
* Patio or balcony off the living room
* Designated covered parking and plenty of off street parking for your guests
* Walking distance to the SMART train station
* Less than a mile to the EPICENTER, a vast complex with a restaurant, sports bar, fitness   facilities, bowling and game zone under one roof.
Close to numerous schools (Piner High, Hillard Comstock Middle School, and Monroe Elementary) with public transportation, many parks and fabulous shopping all moments away.
in our downstairs units only with a $550 pet deposit and monthly pet rent
*For the safety of you, our residents and staff, we practice social distancing guidelines and masks are required*
Please contact us by phone or text only, as this email is not monitored, and we will schedule you a private tour of our community...call
